name: Dreamworld: The Visual Novel (Demo)
description:
[DEMO OF CHAPTER 1 IS ONLY AVAILABLE!] 

INFORMATION:

👁️✨DREAMWORLD: The Visual Novel is a cute, weirdcore/dreamcore visual novel where you wake up in a unknown town called "Starward" in the place: dreamworld!

Meet new friends, explore places and play games, all whilst receiving some weird memories off how you got there and what happens next...✨👁️

CREDITS:
SFX from freesound.org

Features music from code_box, check them out! https://freesound.org/people/code_box/

All assets, sprites and art work is made by Xezien

⚠️WARNING:⚠️

The following game contains:

  • Flashing and bright images 
  • Creepy imagery
  • Loud and sudden noises

This game isn't meant for people under the age of 13

TWITTER -  YOUTUBE -  ITCHIO
